venue.name: Scibelli Enterprise Center, Across from STCC, downstairs media room

item.description:
Public Meeting April 4 2012 7PM

Note: Anyone can come to a public meeting! You do not have to be a dues-paying IRN member.

The IRN presents:

Internet University for Innovators
Everything you need to know about the Internet - in one evening...

Innovators and businesses are missing out on a wealth of opportunity if they don't use the internet to the fullest extent possible. IRN organizers Micheal Kat. and Craig Issod have a combined 30+ years of online and engineering experience, and will present their knowledge, hints and experience in a "lightning round" and "ignite"  presentation. The dynamic segments will include:
Overview on creating a modern web site
Generating Content and Exposure from article creation, forums and blogs.
Low cost advertising with Google
Social Media update - hints for Facebook, Twitter, Quora, etc.

A Question and Answer Session will be held afterwards, so you can be assured that your questions will be answered. Handouts will be distributed so you can follow up on what you've learned.

This presentation will have something for everyone - from the internet newbie to the seasoned expert. Please bring family members and friends who have interest in the topic!

 

---------------------------------------------------------

Note: If you'd like to become a dues paying member of IRN and participate in members-only meetings, factory tours and other member benefits, please sign up or renew using the form on our web site at:

http://www.irnetwork.org/news/4/15/Dues-Drive---Please-join-or-renew.html
item.name: IRN Public Meeting - April 4 - Internet University for Innovators!
